judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
by Curiam,
Order affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: by Curiam,

attorneys: Henry T. Reath, with him David C. Toomey, and Duane, Morris & Heelcscher, for appellants.
Herbert A. Fogel, with him David F. Maxwell, and Obermayer, Rebmann, Maxwell ■& Hippel, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Ellis, Appellant, v. Ellis.
Argued November 27, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Henry T. Reath, with him David C. Toomey, and Duane, Morris & Heelcscher, for appellants.
Herbert A. Fogel, with him David F. Maxwell, and Obermayer, Rebmann, Maxwell ■& Hippel, for appellee.
March 15, 1968:
